parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID.

parameters.name: TopicId
parameters.description: The ID of the topic that you want to describe. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

nested_items.name: TopicId
nested_items.description: The ID of the topic that you want to describe. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the topic.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the topic.

nested_items.name: UserExperienceVersion
nested_items.description: The user experience version of a topic.

nested_items.name: DataSets
nested_items.description: The data sets that the topic is associated with.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: DatasetName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset.

nested_items.name: DatasetDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the dataset.

nested_items.name: DataAggregation
nested_items.description: The definition of a data aggregation.

nested_items.name: DatasetRowDateGranularity
nested_items.description: The level of time precision that is used to aggregate DateTime values.

nested_items.name: DefaultDateColumnName
nested_items.description: The column name for the default date.

nested_items.name: Filters
nested_items.description: The list of filter definitions.

nested_items.name: FilterDescription
nested_items.description: A description of the filter used to select items for a topic.

nested_items.name: FilterClass
nested_items.description: The class of the filter. Valid values for this structure are ENFORCED_VALUE_FILTER, CONDITIONAL_VALUE_FILTER, and NAMED_VALUE_FILTER.

nested_items.name: FilterName
nested_items.description: The name of the filter.

nested_items.name: FilterSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the filter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OperandFieldName
nested_items.description: The name of the field that the filter operates on.

nested_items.name: FilterType
nested_items.description: The type of the filter. Valid values for this structure are CATEGORY_FILTER, NUMERIC_EQUALITY_FILTER, NUMERIC_RANGE_FILTER, DATE_RANGE_FILTER, and RELATIVE_DATE_FILTER.

nested_items.name: CategoryFilter
nested_items.description: The category filter that is associated with this filter.

nested_items.name: CategoryFilterFunction
nested_items.description: The category filter function. Valid values for this structure are EXACT and CONTAINS.

nested_items.name: CategoryFilterType
nested_items.description: The category filter type. This element is used to specify whether a filter is a simple category filter or an inverse category filter.

nested_items.name: ConstantType
nested_items.description: The type of category filter constant. This element is used to specify whether a constant is a singular or collective. Valid values are SINGULAR and COLLECTIVE.

nested_items.name: SingularConstant
nested_items.description: A singular constant used in a category filter. This element is used to specify a single value for the constant.

nested_items.name: CollectiveConstant
nested_items.description: A collective constant used in a category filter. This element is used to specify a list of values for the constant.

nested_items.name: ValueList
nested_items.description: A list of values for the collective constant.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Inverse
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates if the filter is inverse.

nested_items.name: NumericEqualityFilter
nested_items.description: The numeric equality filter.

nested_items.name: ConstantType
nested_items.description: The type of the singular filter constant. Valid values for this structure are SINGULAR.

nested_items.name: SingularConstant
nested_items.description: The value of the singular filter constant.

nested_items.name: Aggregation
nested_items.description: An aggregation function that specifies how to calculate the value of a numeric field for a topic. Valid values for this structure are NO_AGGREGATION, SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, MAX, MEDIAN, MIN, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, and VARP.

nested_items.name: NumericRangeFilter
nested_items.description: The numeric range filter.

nested_items.name: Inclusive
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the endpoints of the numeric range are included in the filter. If set to true, topics whose numeric field value is equal to the endpoint values will be included in the filter. If set to false, topics whose numeric field value is equal to the endpoint values will be excluded from the filter.

nested_items.name: ConstantType
nested_items.description: The data type of the constant value that is used in a range filter. Valid values for this structure are RANGE.

nested_items.name: RangeConstant
nested_items.description: The value of the constant that is used to specify the endpoints of a range filter.

nested_items.name: Minimum
nested_items.description: The minimum value for a range constant.

nested_items.name: Maximum
nested_items.description: The maximum value for a range constant.

nested_items.name: Aggregation
nested_items.description: An aggregation function that specifies how to calculate the value of a numeric field for a topic, Valid values for this structure are NO_AGGREGATION, SUM, AVERAGE, COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, MAX, MEDIAN, MIN, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, and VARP.

nested_items.name: DateRangeFilter
nested_items.description: The date range filter.

nested_items.name: Inclusive
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the date range filter should include the boundary values. If set to true, the filter includes the start and end dates. If set to false, the filter excludes them.

nested_items.name: ConstantType
nested_items.description: The data type of the constant value that is used in a range filter. Valid values for this structure are RANGE.

nested_items.name: RangeConstant
nested_items.description: The value of the constant that is used to specify the endpoints of a range filter.

nested_items.name: Minimum
nested_items.description: The minimum value for a range constant.

nested_items.name: Maximum
nested_items.description: The maximum value for a range constant.

nested_items.name: RelativeDateFilter
nested_items.description: The relative date filter.

nested_items.name: TimeGranularity
nested_items.description: The level of time precision that is used to aggregate DateTime values.

nested_items.name: RelativeDateFilterFunction
nested_items.description: The function to be used in a relative date filter to determine the range of dates to include in the results. Valid values for this structure are BEFORE, AFTER, and BETWEEN.

nested_items.name: ConstantType
nested_items.description: The type of the singular filter constant. Valid values for this structure are SINGULAR.

nested_items.name: SingularConstant
nested_items.description: The value of the singular filter constant.

nested_items.name: Columns
nested_items.description: The list of column definitions.

nested_items.name: ColumnName
nested_items.description: The name of the column.

nested_items.name: ColumnFriendlyName
nested_items.description: A user-friendly name for the column.

nested_items.name: ColumnDescription
nested_items.description: A description of the column and its contents.

nested_items.name: ColumnSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the column.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ColumnDataRole
nested_items.description: The role of the column in the data. Valid values are DIMENSION and MEASURE.

nested_items.name: Aggregation
nested_items.description: The type of aggregation that is performed on the column data when it's queried.

nested_items.name: IsIncludedInTopic
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the column is included in the query results.

nested_items.name: DisableIndexing
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the column shows in the autocomplete functionality.

nested_items.name: ComparativeOrder
nested_items.description: The order in which data is displayed for the column when it's used in a comparative context.

nested_items.name: UseOrdering
nested_items.description: The ordering type for a column. Valid values for this structure are GREATER_IS_BETTER, LESSER_IS_BETTER and SPECIFIED.

nested_items.name: SpecifedOrder
nested_items.description: The list of columns to be used in the ordering.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TreatUndefinedSpecifiedValues
nested_items.description: The treat of undefined specified values. Valid values for this structure are LEAST and MOST.

nested_items.name: SemanticType
nested_items.description: The semantic type of data contained in the column.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The semantic type name.

nested_items.name: SubTypeName
nested_items.description: The semantic type sub type name.

nested_items.name: TypeParameters
nested_items.description: The semantic type parameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TruthyCellValue
nested_items.description: The semantic type truthy cell value.

nested_items.name: TruthyCellValueSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the true cell value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FalseyCellValue
nested_items.description: The semantic type falsey cell value.

nested_items.name: FalseyCellValueSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the false cell value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TimeGranularity
nested_items.description: The level of time precision that is used to aggregate DateTime values.

nested_items.name: AllowedAggregations
nested_items.description: The list of aggregation types that are allowed for the column. Valid values for this structure are COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, MIN, MAX, MEDIAN, SUM, AVERAGE, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, VARP, and PERCENTILE.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotAllowedAggregations
nested_items.description: The list of aggregation types that are not allowed for the column. Valid values for this structure are COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, MIN, MAX, MEDIAN, SUM, AVERAGE, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, VARP, and PERCENTILE.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DefaultFormatting
nested_items.description: The default formatting used for values in the column.

nested_items.name: DisplayFormat
nested_items.description: The display format. Valid values for this structure are AUTO, PERCENT, CURRENCY, NUMBER, DATE, and STRING.

nested_items.name: DisplayFormatOptions
nested_items.description: The additional options for display formatting.

nested_items.name: UseBlankCellFormat
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use blank cell format.

nested_items.name: BlankCellFormat
nested_items.description: Determines the blank cell format.

nested_items.name: DateFormat
nested_items.description: Determines the DateTime format.

nested_items.name: DecimalSeparator
nested_items.description: Determines the decimal separator.

nested_items.name: GroupingSeparator
nested_items.description: Determines the grouping separator.

nested_items.name: UseGrouping
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use grouping.

nested_items.name: FractionDigits
nested_items.description: Determines the number of fraction digits.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix value for a display format.

nested_items.name: Suffix
nested_items.description: The suffix value for a display format.

nested_items.name: UnitScaler
nested_items.description: The unit scaler. Valid values for this structure are: NONE, AUTO, THOUSANDS, MILLIONS, BILLIONS, and TRILLIONS.

nested_items.name: NegativeFormat
nested_items.description: The negative format.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for a negative format.

nested_items.name: Suffix
nested_items.description: The suffix for a negative format.

nested_items.name: CurrencySymbol
nested_items.description: The currency symbol, such as USD.

nested_items.name: NeverAggregateInFilter
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to aggregate the column data when it's used in a filter context.

nested_items.name: CellValueSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the column cell value.

nested_items.name: CellValue
nested_items.description: The cell value.

nested_items.name: Synonyms
nested_items.description: Other names or aliases for the cell value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NonAdditive
nested_items.description: The non additive value for the column.

nested_items.name: CalculatedFields
nested_items.description: The list of calculated field definitions.

nested_items.name: CalculatedFieldName
nested_items.description: The calculated field name.

nested_items.name: CalculatedFieldDescription
nested_items.description: The calculated field description.

nested_items.name: Expression
nested_items.description: The calculated field expression.

nested_items.name: CalculatedFieldSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the calculated field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: IsIncludedInTopic
nested_items.description: A boolean value that indicates if a calculated field is included in the topic.

nested_items.name: DisableIndexing
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates if a calculated field is visible in the autocomplete.

nested_items.name: ColumnDataRole
nested_items.description: The column data role for a calculated field. Valid values for this structure are DIMENSION and MEASURE.

nested_items.name: TimeGranularity
nested_items.description: The level of time precision that is used to aggregate DateTime values.

nested_items.name: DefaultFormatting
nested_items.description: The default formatting definition.

nested_items.name: DisplayFormat
nested_items.description: The display format. Valid values for this structure are AUTO, PERCENT, CURRENCY, NUMBER, DATE, and STRING.

nested_items.name: DisplayFormatOptions
nested_items.description: The additional options for display formatting.

nested_items.name: UseBlankCellFormat
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use blank cell format.

nested_items.name: BlankCellFormat
nested_items.description: Determines the blank cell format.

nested_items.name: DateFormat
nested_items.description: Determines the DateTime format.

nested_items.name: DecimalSeparator
nested_items.description: Determines the decimal separator.

nested_items.name: GroupingSeparator
nested_items.description: Determines the grouping separator.

nested_items.name: UseGrouping
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use grouping.

nested_items.name: FractionDigits
nested_items.description: Determines the number of fraction digits.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix value for a display format.

nested_items.name: Suffix
nested_items.description: The suffix value for a display format.

nested_items.name: UnitScaler
nested_items.description: The unit scaler. Valid values for this structure are: NONE, AUTO, THOUSANDS, MILLIONS, BILLIONS, and TRILLIONS.

nested_items.name: NegativeFormat
nested_items.description: The negative format.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for a negative format.

nested_items.name: Suffix
nested_items.description: The suffix for a negative format.

nested_items.name: CurrencySymbol
nested_items.description: The currency symbol, such as USD.

nested_items.name: Aggregation
nested_items.description: The default aggregation. Valid values for this structure are SUM, MAX, MIN, COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, and AVERAGE.

nested_items.name: ComparativeOrder
nested_items.description: The order in which data is displayed for the calculated field when it's used in a comparative context.

nested_items.name: UseOrdering
nested_items.description: The ordering type for a column. Valid values for this structure are GREATER_IS_BETTER, LESSER_IS_BETTER and SPECIFIED.

nested_items.name: SpecifedOrder
nested_items.description: The list of columns to be used in the ordering.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TreatUndefinedSpecifiedValues
nested_items.description: The treat of undefined specified values. Valid values for this structure are LEAST and MOST.

nested_items.name: SemanticType
nested_items.description: The semantic type.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The semantic type name.

nested_items.name: SubTypeName
nested_items.description: The semantic type sub type name.

nested_items.name: TypeParameters
nested_items.description: The semantic type parameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TruthyCellValue
nested_items.description: The semantic type truthy cell value.

nested_items.name: TruthyCellValueSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the true cell value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FalseyCellValue
nested_items.description: The semantic type falsey cell value.

nested_items.name: FalseyCellValueSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the false cell value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AllowedAggregations
nested_items.description: The list of aggregation types that are allowed for the calculated field. Valid values for this structure are COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, MIN, MAX, MEDIAN, SUM, AVERAGE, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, VARP, and PERCENTILE.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotAllowedAggregations
nested_items.description: The list of aggregation types that are not allowed for the calculated field. Valid values for this structure are COUNT, DISTINCT_COUNT, MIN, MAX, MEDIAN, SUM, AVERAGE, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, VARP, and PERCENTILE.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NeverAggregateInFilter
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to never aggregate calculated field in filters.

nested_items.name: CellValueSynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the calculated field cell value.

nested_items.name: CellValue
nested_items.description: The cell value.

nested_items.name: Synonyms
nested_items.description: Other names or aliases for the cell value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NonAdditive
nested_items.description: The non additive for the table style target.

nested_items.name: NamedEntities
nested_items.description: The list of named entities definitions.

nested_items.name: EntityName
nested_items.description: The name of the named entity.

nested_items.name: EntityDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the named entity.

nested_items.name: EntitySynonyms
nested_items.description: The other names or aliases for the named entity.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SemanticEntityType
nested_items.description: The type of named entity that a topic represents.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The semantic entity type name.

nested_items.name: SubTypeName
nested_items.description: The semantic entity sub type name.

nested_items.name: TypeParameters
nested_items.description: The semantic entity type parameters.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Definition
nested_items.description: The definition of a named entity.

nested_items.name: FieldName
nested_items.description: The name of the entity.

nested_items.name: PropertyName
nested_items.description: The property name to be used for the named entity.

nested_items.name: PropertyRole
nested_items.description: The property role. Valid values for this structure are PRIMARY and ID.

nested_items.name: PropertyUsage
nested_items.description: The property usage. Valid values for this structure are INHERIT, DIMENSION, and MEASURE.

nested_items.name: Aggregation
nested_items.description: The aggregation of a named entity. Valid values for this structure are SUM, MIN, MAX, COUNT, AVERAGE, DISTINCT_COUNT, STDEV, STDEVP, VAR, VARP, PERCENTILE, MEDIAN, and CUSTOM.

nested_items.name: AggregationFunctionParameters
nested_items.description: The additional parameters for an aggregation function.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ConfigOptions
nested_items.description: Configuration options for a Topic.

nested_items.name: QBusinessInsightsEnabled
nested_items.description: Enables Amazon Q Business Insights for a Topic.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
